name: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta with garlic until crispy.
Beat eggs and Parmesan in a bowl, then mix with the drained pasta and pancetta.
Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately.

name: Classic Caesar Salad
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Grill the chicken breast and slice it.
Chop the romaine lettuce and mix with croutons and Parmesan.
Add the Caesar dressing and top with sliced chicken.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

name: Vegetable Stir Fry
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)
Salt and black pepper to taste
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté for 1 minute.
Add mixed vegetables and soy sauce, stir-fry for 5-7 minutes.
Season with salt and pepper, serve hot.

name: Beef Tacos
ingredients: Shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream (for garnish)
instructions: Brown ground beef and onion in a pan.
Stir in taco seasoning and water, simmer until thickened.
Fill taco shells with beef mixture and garnish as desired.

name: Chicken Curry
instructions: Heat oil in a large pot, add onions and ginger-garlic paste, sauté until golden.
Add chicken pieces and brown on all sides.
Mix in tomatoes and curry powder, cook for 5 minutes.
Pour in coconut milk, simmer until chicken is cooked through.
Season with salt, serve with rice.

name: Lemon Garlic Salmon
instructions: Preheat oven to 200°C (400°F).
Place salmon on a baking sheet, season with salt, pepper, garlic, and top with lemon slices.
Drizzle with olive oil, bake for 12-15 minutes.

name: Avocado Toast
instructions: Toast the bread slices to your liking.
Mash the avocado and spread it on the toasted bread.
Season with salt, pepper, red pepper flakes, and a squeeze of lemon juice.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: Heat olive oil in a pan, add onion and garlic, cook until translucent.
Add mushrooms, cook until soft.
Stir in Arborio rice, cook for 1 minute.
Gradually add broth, stirring constantly, until rice is creamy and cooked.
Stir in Parmesan, season with salt and pepper.

name: Tomato Soup
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot, add onions, carrots, celery, and garlic, cook until soft.
Add tomatoes and vegetable broth, bring to a boil, then simmer for 30 minutes.
Blend soup until smooth, season with salt and pepper, serve hot.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C).
Mix flour, baking soda, and salt in a bowl.
In another bowl, beat butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, and vanilla extract.
Add eggs one at a time, gradually mix in flour.
Stir in chocolate chips, drop by spoonfuls onto baking sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown.
